text: Assemblies (Jehova Shammah) is a Christian denomination of India. It has more than 2,000 branches. It is present in Andhra Pradesh.World Christian Encyclopedia, Second edition, 2001 Volume 1, p. 368 Jehova Shammah was founded by Bhakta Singh in 1942. == References == Category:Christian denominations in India Category:Christian organizations established in 1942 Category:1942 establishments in India
title: Assemblies (Jehova Shammah)
